lemma ccw_sorted_implies_ccw'_sortedP: assumes nonaligned: "\<And>y z. y \<in> set Ps \<Longrightarrow> z \<in> set Ps \<Longrightarrow> y \<noteq> z \<Longrightarrow> \<not> coll 0 y z" assumes sorted: "linorder_list0.sortedP (ccw 0) Ps" assumes "distinct Ps" shows "linorder_list0.sortedP (ccw' 0 ) Ps"
